mean_cn: vi.（在别无办法的情况下）诉诸，采用；  n.诉诸，凭借；度假胜地
mean_en: (resort to) to make use of something, especially something bad, as a means of achieving something, often because there is no other possible solution; to seek aid, relief, or advantage
sentence: He had to resort to selling his house because of the high medical costs.
sentence_trans: 高昂的医疗费用使他不得不卖掉房子。
